law.catch_line: Annual report by agency if space reconfigured, use changed, or number of employees occupying space changed for state-owned or leased property.

text.section:
Except as provided in subsection (3) of this section, in September of each year, every agency shall report to the Finance and Administration Cabinet concerning any state-owned or leased property if, in the preceding twelve (12) months, the agency has:
Reconfigured ten percent (10%) more of the space; or
Changed the use of ten percent (10%) or more of the space; or
Changed the number of employees occupying the space by ten percent (10%) or more.
The provisions of this section shall not apply when the property involved covers less than one thousand (1,000) square feet.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 33, secs. 1 and 2, effective July 15, 1994.
